Interface ErrorDataInterface

Created 10-06-10

Changelog available at ErrorDataInterface.

All Known Implementing Classes:
ErrorData
public interface ErrorDataInterface

A handler for the types of errors we find in the source code, and the data
that it involves.

Author:
Jeff

Method Summary
 void add(int lineNumber, int errorCode, java.lang.String errorMessage)
          Adds the necessary describing data to the ErrorData object for use
in the ErrorOut class.
 java.lang.String errorMessage()
          Gets the error message corresponding to the error code.
 int getErrorCode()
          Gets the error code of the error in question.
 int getLineNumber()
          Gets the line number of the error in question.
 

Method Detail

add

void add(int lineNumber,
         int errorCode,
         java.lang.String errorMessage)
Adds the necessary describing data to the ErrorData object for use
in the ErrorOut class.

Parameters:
lineNumber - The line the error was found on.
errorCode - The error code assigned to the error.
errorMessage - The error message corresponding to the error code.

getLineNumber

int getLineNumber()
Gets the line number of the error in question.

Returns:
The line the error was found on.

getErrorCode

int getErrorCode()
Gets the error code of the error in question.

Returns:
The error code number of the error found.

errorMessage

java.lang.String errorMessage()
Gets the error message corresponding to the error code.

Returns:
The error message corresponding to the error code.
